summary: You find a small shack in the wilderness near whiterun, it\'s empty, abandoned... You approach a desk with a strange book laying ontop of it.
descriptionHtml:
This adventure takes place near Whiterun, in a small abandoned cottage you will find a diary, belonging to an orc named Forrest. As you read it you discover that some pages are missing. Upon exploring the house you will also find that only one area is available, as you are missing the key to access the other area.
Follow the clues in each diary entry to recover all the pages and the key to unlock the entire house. Learn the story of a forgotten adventurer. Good luck!

(The house is located north west of whiterun and west of dustman\'s cairn, fast travel is available once discovered).

(Updated Version)
-Added tanning rack
-Fixed many visual bugs
-Added an ending diary entry in reward room.

I re-uploaded the mod due to the fact that the commenting was locked due to a nexus bug.  This is a finished mod that has been worked on over a period of time. The mod may be updated from time to time, so feel free to add suggestions, I will listen to every one... I\'m always checking the nexus and working to make something that everyone loves.
author: waxman08
